definition: to train together/to practice as a group
to gather/to collect/collected works/classifier for sections of a TV series etc: episode
to teach/to train/to admonish/instruction (from superiors)/teachings/rule

sentences.english: Anelka left the Team France Camp on the same evening.
sentences.chinese: 阿内尔卡在当天晚上就离开了法国队集训营。

sentences.english: What is your expectation of the course of Project Management?
sentences.chinese: 您对成功的项目管理集训这门课期望的是什么？

sentences.english: "We knew we were coming back this summer, " Colangelo said.
sentences.chinese: “我们都知道今年夏天要集训，”科朗吉诺说。

sentences.english: B: Oh, we attended Crazy English Camp together three months ago.
sentences.chinese: 噢，三个月前，我们一起参加了疯狂英语集训营。

sentences.english: We've gained a lot in the get- togethers and the three games we've had over the last three weeks.
sentences.chinese: 我们在集训以及最近三周的三场比赛中收获了许多。

sentences.english: My family is going to the Rocky English Training Camp together this summer.
sentences.chinese: 今年夏天我们全家一起去洛基英语集训营。

sentences.english: My family is going to the Crazy English Training Camp together this summer .
sentences.chinese: 我们全家今年夏天要一起去参加疯狂英语集训营。

sentences.english: I'm going to take the Crazy English Intensive Training Camp this summer .
sentences.chinese: 我这个暑假要参加疯狂英语强化集训营。

sentences.english: Getting on the Olympic team is her prime objective ever since her childhood.
sentences.chinese: 从孩提时代起，参加奥运会集训队就是她的首要目标。

sentences.english: But no matter how I read this sentence, I always get the hint that I am this training center.
sentences.chinese: 但是怎么读都觉得“我”就是这个“集训中心”了呢？

sentences.english: I will be the manager of the project "Future Leader's English Training Camp".
sentences.chinese: 我将会成为未来领袖英语集训营项目推广总经理。

sentences.english: I could tell them that you went to tennis camp.
sentences.chinese: 我会告诉他们你去参加网球集训营了。

sentences.english: Switzerland was very positive and the training sessions had a good intensity.
sentences.chinese: 瑞士集训日受到积极的效果，集训课程队内气氛融融。

sentences.english: Switzerland was very positive and the training sessions had a good intensity.
sentences.chinese: 瑞士集训日受到积极的效果，集训课程队内气氛融融。

sentences.english: Xiaoya enters the national team through competition.
sentences.chinese: 小雅通过了比赛进入了国家集训队。

sentences.english: Objective To improve and prevent fatigue under intense training of certain special soldiers.
sentences.chinese: 目的改善与防护某特种兵队员高强度集训疲劳。
